name: Sounds Like Me
description:
The only person we ever listen to is ourself. 

The holy grail of mind control does not lie in drugs but in sound. 

 - Dr.Bortus, Inventor of 'The Headphone'

 A puzzle game where you control people by installing an internal voice modulator - called 'The Headphone' by its inventor. The game has 2 levels that need you to think like the great Dr. Bortus to experience the first hours of this phenomenal invention that changed everything.

Made by Vivek Padmaji, RockLobster Games

Made for BYOG 2022 | Theme - "It does sound like me"
